import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import WordPairExample from './components/WordPairExample' import Center from 'modules/shared/Center' const desc = '%a adalah sejenis %b' const WordPair = ({ word1, word2, example, isLoading }) => isLoading ? (
loading..
) : (

{word1} → {word2}

) const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ ...state.wordPairState }) const WordPairConnected = connect(mapStateToProps)(WordPair) export default WordPairConnected
